airtable._comment.tableId: table ID, optional if tableName is provided
airtable._comment.tableName: table name, optional if tableId is provided
airtable._comment.viewName: optional view name in the table
airtable._comment.token: optional access token (fallback to AIRTABLE_TOKEN env)
airtable._comment.tokenPath: optional token path (fallback to AIRTABLE_TOKEN_PATH env)

github._comment.projectName: Project name that associated with the issues to sync
github._comment.fieldMap: mapping from github field to airtable field

fieldMap._comment.fields: Example fields to sync, left is github field name, right is airtable field name

github._comment.token: optional access token (fallback to GITHUB_TOKEN env)
github._comment.tokenPath: optional token path (fallback to GITHUB_TOKEN_PATH env)
